title: Slow first .cuda() call
body_html:
I upgraded to v0.3.1 using conda and have since experienced really slow performance the first time I call .cuda(). I tried solutions listed here and here but no luck. I then tried installing the latest version from source but still experienced the slowdown. Any help would be hugely appreciated!

Info

  • OS: CentOS 7.4.1708
  • PyTorch version: tried 0.3.1 (conda) and 0.4.0a0+6279367 (source)
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda, source
  • Python version: 3.6.3
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0.61, 7.0.2
  • GPU models and configuration: 1080ti
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 7.2.0
